string.name: movePieceFromE2ToE4
string.comment:
movePieceFromE2ToE4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

string.name: moveKnightToC3
string.comment:
moveKnightToC3
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

string.name: dropARookAtB4
string.comment:
dropARookAtB4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Utzi gaztelua b4 laukian (Crazyhouse aldaeran bakarrik)

string.name: readOutOpponentName
string.comment:
readOutOpponentName
Press a button on the keyboard to hear the opponent's name aloud. The feature is most useful for blind players.

resources.string: Goiko mugimenduen notazioa ez bada ezaguna, gehiago ikasi hemen:

string.name: bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
string.comment:
bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
Only the Latin character 'o' works.

resources.string: Bai \"o\" hizkia, bai zero \"0\" digitua erabil daitezke endrokatzean
Bi aldeetako endrokea egitea legezkoa bada erabili enter endroke laburra egiteko
Letra larriak alfila eta b-ko peoia bereizte erabiltzen dira (piezen izenak ingelesez daude Alfila = Bishop ingelesez)
Aurre-mugimendua egiteko, idatzi nahi duzun mugimendua zure txanda izan aurretik
